KScriptSetting.Name: User
KScriptSetting.Description: Kooboo login user available from version 1.1 and up
KScriptSetting.Example:
<script engine="kscript">

    if (k.request.username)
    {  
       var user = k.user.login(k.request.username, k.request.password);  
    }  
 
    if (!k.user.isLogin)
    {
        k.response.write("user not login"); 
    }
</script>

Property.Name: userName
Property.Description: user name of current kooboo login user.

Property.Name: isLogin
Property.Description: where there is a login user or not

Method.Name: login
Method.Description: Validate a kooboo user login information and return the user info if succeed
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">

    if (k.request.username)
    {  
       var user = k.user.login(k.request.username, k.request.password);  
    }  
 
    if (!k.user.isLogin)
    {
        k.response.write("user not login"); 
    }
</script>

Method.Name: logout
Method.Example:
<script engine="kscript">
          if (k.user.isLogin)
          {
          k.user.logout();

          k.response.redirect("/__kb/view/login");
          }
          else
          {
          k.response.write("you are not login");
          }
</script>
